main event: Two officers driving in NW Montana observed a bright light in the sky that resembled an aircraft at first, but displayed no trail or obstruction lights.
interesting points: The object was an intense bright light that rapidly changed direction,The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 minutes,The light broke into several smaller lights that disappeared instantly,There were no discernible details such as shape or sound reported, FAA reports confirmed a similar sighting involving burning pieces falling off another object in the vicinity.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
